titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C17

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

body.ab: <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.07" unit="tei:head"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__1"/>Vol. II <lb n="c57-0002__main__2"/>Chap I<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__3"/>"It is with difficulty that I remember <lb n="c57-0002__main__4"/>the æra of my <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e26__Start"/>cr<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e26__End"/> being. All the events of <lb n="c57-0002__main__5"/>that period appear confused & indistinct. <lb n="c57-0002__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e32__Start"/>I know only that I felt a strange<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e32__End"/> A strange <lb n="c57-0002__main__7"/>sensation <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e40__Start"/>sea<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e40__End"/> seized me <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e43__Start"/>and a it appeared<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e43__End"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__8"/>I saw, felt heard and smelt at the same <lb n="c57-0002__main__9"/>time and it was indeed a long time be<lb n="c57-0002__main__10"/>fore I learned to distinguish between the <lb n="c57-0002__main__11"/><lb n="c57-0002__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0002__left_margin__d1e62__Start"/>various <del loc="c57-0002__left_margin__d1e62__End"/><del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e65__Start"/>op<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e65__End"/>operations of my various senses. By degrees <lb n="c57-0002__main__12"/>I remember a stronger light pressed upon <lb n="c57-0002__main__13"/>my nerves <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e75__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e75__End"/> so that I was obliged to close <lb n="c57-0002__main__14"/>my eyes. Darkness then came over me <lb n="c57-0002__main__15"/>and troubled me.– But hardly had I felt <lb n="c57-0002__main__16"/>this when (by opening my eyes as I now suppose) <lb n="c57-0002__main__17"/>the light poured in upon me again– I walked <lb n="c57-0002__main__18"/>and I believe descended; but presently I found <lb n="c57-0002__main__19"/>a great <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e93__Start"/>difference<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e93__End"/>alteration in my sensations; before <lb n="c57-0002__main__20"/>dark opaque bodies had surrounded me,<lb n="c57-0002__main__21"/>impervious to my touch or sight – and I <lb n="c57-0002__main__22"/>now found that I could wander on at liberty <lb n="c57-0002__main__23"/>with no obstacles which I could not either <lb n="c57-0002__main__24"/>surmount or avoid– The light <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e114__Start"/>be<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e114__End"/> became <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>more&<lb n="c57-0002__main__25"/>more opressive to me and the heat wearying <lb n="c57-0002__main__26"/>me as I walked I sought a place where I could <lb n="c57-0002__main__27"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.04" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.02"/>perceive<milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.03"/>recieve shade. This was the forest near Ingolstadt,<lb n="c57-0002__main__28"/>and here by the side of a brook I lay <del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e146__Start"/>weary<del loc="c57-0002__main__d1e146__End"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__29"/>for some hours <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>resting from my fatigue untill I felt tormented by <lb n="c57-0002__main__30"/>hunger and thirst. This roused me from my nearly<lb n="c57-0003__main__1"/>dormant state and I ate some berries <lb n="c57-0003__main__2"/>which I found <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hanging on the trees or lying on <lb n="c57-0003__main__3"/>the ground – I slaked my thirst by the <lb n="c57-0003__main__4"/>brook and then again lying down I was <lb n="c57-0003__main__5"/>overcome by sleep; It was dark when I <lb n="c57-0003__main__6"/>awoke, I felt cold also and half frightened <lb n="c57-0003__main__7"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as it were instinctively on <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e208__Start"/>seein<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e208__End"/> finding myself so desolate. <lb n="c57-0003__main__8"/>Before I had quitted your appartment <lb n="c57-0003__main__9"/>on a sensation of cold I had covered my <lb n="c57-0003__main__10"/>self with some clothes, but these were <lb n="c57-0003__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e222__Start"/>not<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e222__End"/>insufficient to secure me from the <lb n="c57-0003__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e230__Start"/>dw<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e230__End"/> dews of night. I was a poor helpless <lb n="c57-0003__main__13"/>miserable wretch—I knew <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e235__Start"/>no<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e235__End"/>& could <lb n="c57-0003__main__14"/>distinguish <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e241__Start"/>no<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e241__End"/> nothing but <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e246__Start"/>felt<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e246__End"/><metamark>^</metamark>feeling pain <lb n="c57-0003__main__15"/>invade me on all sides <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e259__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e259__End"/> I sat down <lb n="c57-0003__main__16"/>and wept.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0003__main__17"/>Soon a gentle light stole over the <lb n="c57-0003__main__18"/>heavens and gave me a sensation of pleasure <lb n="c57-0003__main__19"/>I started up, and beheld a radiant form <lb n="c57-0003__main__20"/>rise <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e275__Start"/>am<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e275__End"/> from among the trees. I gazed with <lb n="c57-0003__main__21"/>a kind of wonder – It moved slowly; but <lb n="c57-0003__main__22"/>it enlightened my path, and I again <lb n="c57-0003__main__23"/>went out in search of berries. I was still <lb n="c57-0003__main__24"/>cold when <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e287__Start"/>on the ground<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e287__End"/> under one of the <lb n="c57-0003__main__25"/>trees I found a huge cloak with which I– <lb n="c57-0003__main__26"/>covered myself, and sat down on the ground. <lb n="c57-0003__main__27"/>No distinct ideas occupied my mind all was <lb n="c57-0003__main__28"/>confused <del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e299__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0003__main__d1e299__End"/> I felt the light, and hunger <lb n="c57-0003__main__29"/>and thirst and darkness; innumerable <lb n="c57-0003__main__30"/>sounds rung in my ears and on all sides <lb n="c57-0003__main__31"/>various scents saluted me; the only object <lb n="c57-0003__main__32"/>that I could distinguish was the bright<lb n="c57-0004__main__1"/>moon and I fixed my eyes on <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e327__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e327__End"/> that with <lb n="c57-0004__main__2"/>pleasure. Several changes of day and night <lb n="c57-0004__main__3"/>passed and the orb of night had greatly <lb n="c57-0004__main__4"/>lessened when I began to distinguish my <lb n="c57-0004__main__5"/>sensations <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>from each other–. I <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e351__Start"/>first saw<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e351__End"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e355__Start"/>dis<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e355__End"/> gradually saw plainly the clear stream <lb n="c57-0004__main__6"/>that supplied me with drink and the <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e363__Start"/>gre<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e363__End"/><lb n="c57-0004__main__7"/>trees that <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e371__Start"/>covered<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e371__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>shaded me with their foliage. <lb n="c57-0004__main__8"/>I was delighted when I first discovered <lb n="c57-0004__main__9"/>that a pleasant sound <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e388__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e388__End"/>which often <lb n="c57-0004__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e397__Start"/>delighte<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e397__End"/> saluted my ears proceeded <lb n="c57-0004__main__11"/>from the throats of <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e402__Start"/>son<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e402__End"/> the little <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e407__Start"/>anih<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e407__End"/>winged<lb n="c57-0004__main__12"/>animals who often intercepted the light<lb n="c57-0004__main__13"/>from my eyes. I began also to see <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e428__Start"/>an<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e428__End"/><lb n="c57-0004__main__14"/>with <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e433__Start"/>forms<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e433__End"/> greater accuracy the forms <lb n="c57-0004__main__15"/>that surrounded me and to perceive <lb n="c57-0004__main__16"/>the boundaries of the radiant light which <lb n="c57-0004__main__17"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e442__Start"/>overspeaed my dwelling<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e442__End"/> canopied me.–some<lb n="c57-0004__main__18"/>times I tried to imitate the pleasant songs of <lb n="c57-0004__main__19"/>the birds but was unable— Sometimes I <lb n="c57-0004__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e458__Start"/>also<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e458__End"/> wished to express my sensations in <lb n="c57-0004__main__21"/>my own mode but the uncouth and innarticu<lb n="c57-0004__main__22"/>late sound which broke from me <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e480__Start"/>which<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e480__End"/> frightened <lb n="c57-0004__main__23"/>me into silence again.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0004__main__24"/>The moon had dissapeared from the night, &<lb n="c57-0004__main__25"/>again with a lessened form it shewed itself <lb n="c57-0004__main__26"/><del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e493__Start"/>again<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e493__End"/> while I still remained in the forest. <lb n="c57-0004__main__27"/>My <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e500__Start"/>ideas<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e500__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sensations were by this time become distinct <lb n="c57-0004__main__28"/>&<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my mind received every day aditional <del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e525__Start"/>ones<del loc="c57-0004__main__d1e525__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ideas. My eyes <lb n="c57-0004__main__29"/>became accustomed to the light and to <lb n="c57-0004__main__30"/>perceive objects in their right forms; I distin<lb n="c57-0005__main__1"/><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/>guished the<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e558__Start"/>insect<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e558__End"/> insect from the herb, and by de<lb n="c57-0005__main__2"/>grees one herb from <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e568__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e568__End"/> another – I found <lb n="c57-0005__main__3"/>that the sparrow uttered none but harsh <lb n="c57-0005__main__4"/>notes <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e577__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e577__End"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e580__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e580__End"/>whilst<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e590__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e590__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>those of the blackbird were sweet <lb n="c57-0005__main__5"/>and enticing. <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e604__Start"/>I had le<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e604__End"/> one day when I was <lb n="c57-0005__main__6"/>oppressed by cold I found a fire that <lb n="c57-0005__main__7"/>had been left by some wandering beg<lb n="c57-0005__main__8"/>gars and was over come with delight<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0005.02">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__2"/> at the warmth <lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__3"/>which I ex- <lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__4"/>perienced from <lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__5"/>it.<lb n="c57-0005__main__9"/>In my joy I thrust my hand into the <lb n="c57-0005__main__10"/>live embers but quickly drew it away with a cry<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e651__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e651__End"/><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/>of <lb n="c57-0005__main__11"/>pain– How strange, I thought, that the <lb n="c57-0005__main__12"/>same cause should at once produce <lb n="c57-0005__main__13"/>such <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e668__Start"/>delicious and such<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e668__End"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e671__Start"/>u<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e671__End"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e676__Start"/>opp<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e676__End"/> opposite <lb n="c57-0005__main__14"/>effects –I examined the materials of the <lb n="c57-0005__main__15"/>fire, & to my joy found it to be wood – <lb n="c57-0005__main__16"/>I quickly collected some branches but <lb n="c57-0005__main__17"/>they were wet and would not burn. <lb n="c57-0005__main__18"/>I was pained at this and sat still <lb n="c57-0005__main__19"/>watching the o<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e692__Start"/>p<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e692__End"/>peration of the fire. <lb n="c57-0005__main__20"/>The wet wood I had placed near the heat <lb n="c57-0005__main__21"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e700__Start"/>became dy dry<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e700__End"/>dried, and itself <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e707__Start"/>became<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e707__End"/> became <lb n="c57-0005__main__22"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e714__Start"/>hot<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e714__End"/><lb n="c57-0005__left_margin__1"/>inflamed. I reflected on this, and by touching <lb n="c57-0005__main__23"/>the various branches I discovered the cause <lb n="c57-0005__main__24"/>and busied myself in collecting a great <lb n="c57-0005__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e738__Start"/>deal<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e738__End"/>quantity of wood that I might dry it and <lb n="c57-0005__main__26"/>have a <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e748__Start"/>pel<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e748__End"/> plentiful supply oof fire. When night <lb n="c57-0005__main__27"/>came on and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>brought with it sleep, I was in the greatest <lb n="c57-0005__main__28"/>fear lest my fire should be extinguished <lb n="c57-0005__main__29"/>I covered it carefully with <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e774__Start"/>try<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e774__End"/> dry wood <lb n="c57-0005__main__30"/>and leaves & then placed upon that wet <lb n="c57-0005__main__31"/>branches and then spreading my cloak I <del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e781__Start"/>la<del loc="c57-0005__main__d1e781__End"/><lb n="c57-0006__main__1"/>on the ground & sunk into sleep. I was morning <lb n="c57-0006__main__2"/>when I It was morning when I awoke & my <lb n="c57-0006__main__3"/>first care was to visit the fire –I uncovered <lb n="c57-0006__main__4"/>it and <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e807__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e807__End"/> a gentle breeze quickly fanned it <lb n="c57-0006__main__5"/>into a flame I observed this also and contri<lb n="c57-0006__main__6"/>ved a fan of branches which roused the <lb n="c57-0006__main__7"/>embers when thy were nearly extinguished. <lb n="c57-0006__main__8"/>When night again came I found with plea<lb n="c57-0006__main__9"/>sure that the fire gave light as well <lb n="c57-0006__main__10"/>as heat <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e832__Start"/>and I often<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e832__End"/> and the discovery of this <lb n="c57-0006__main__11"/>element was useful to me also in my food– <lb n="c57-0006__main__12"/>for I found some of offals that the travel<lb n="c57-0006__main__13"/>lers had left had been roasted and tasted <lb n="c57-0006__main__14"/>much more savoury than the berries <lb n="c57-0006__main__15"/>I gathered; I tried therefore to dress my food <lb n="c57-0006__main__16"/>in the same manner, placing them <lb n="c57-0006__main__17"/>on the live embers– I found that the <lb n="c57-0006__main__18"/>berries were spoiled by this o<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e857__Start"/>p<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e857__End"/>peration <lb n="c57-0006__main__19"/>and the nuts much improved. Food <lb n="c57-0006__main__20"/>however became very scarce and I often <lb n="c57-0006__main__21"/>spent a day searching in vain for a <lb n="c57-0006__main__22"/>few acorns to assuage the pangs of hunger. <lb n="c57-0006__main__23"/>When I found this resolved to quit the place <lb n="c57-0006__main__24"/>which I had hitherto inhabited & to seek for <lb n="c57-0006__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e876__Start"/>a place<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e876__End"/>one where the few wants I expe<lb n="c57-0006__main__26"/>rienced would be more easily satisfied. <lb n="c57-0006__main__27"/>In this emigration I <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e894__Start"/>extremely<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e894__End"/>exceedingly lamented the <lb n="c57-0006__main__28"/>loss of my fire–I had obtained it <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e903__Start"/>by<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e903__End"/> by strange <lb n="c57-0006__main__29"/>means and knew not how to reproduce it. <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e914__Start"/>by myself<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e914__End"/><lb n="c57-0006__main__30"/><del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e920__Start"/>This<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e920__End"/><lb n="c57-0006__left_margin__1"/>this deficiency obtained my serious consideration for <lb n="c57-0006__main__31"/>several hours but I was obliged to <del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e933__Start"/>leave it<del loc="c57-0006__main__d1e933__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__1"/><lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__1"/>relinquish all <lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__2"/>attempts to <lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__3"/>supply it, and wrapping myself up in my cloak <lb n="c57-0007__main__2"/>I struck across the wood towards the <lb n="c57-0007__main__3"/>setting sun – I passed three days in these <lb n="c57-0007__main__4"/>rambles and at length discovered the <lb n="c57-0007__main__5"/>open country – A great fall of snow had <lb n="c57-0007__main__6"/>taken place the night before and the <lb n="c57-0007__main__7"/>fields were of one uni<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e972__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e972__End"/>form white the <lb n="c57-0007__main__8"/>appearrance was disconsolate and I <lb n="c57-0007__main__9"/>found my feet chilled by the cold <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e980__Start"/>dab<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e980__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__10"/>damp <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>substance that covered the ground – It was about seven in <lb n="c57-0007__main__11"/>the morning and I longed to obtain food <lb n="c57-0007__main__12"/>and shelter. At length I perceived <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1000__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1000__End"/> a <lb n="c57-0007__main__13"/>small hut which had <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1005__Start"/>b<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1005__End"/> doubtless been <lb n="c57-0007__main__14"/>built for the convenience of <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1011__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1011__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__15"/>some shepheard. This was a new sight <lb n="c57-0007__main__16"/>to me and I examined the <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1022__Start"/>stu<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1022__End"/>struc<lb n="c57-0007__main__17"/>ture of it with great curiosity. <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1032__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1032__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__18"/>finding the door open I entered. An old <lb n="c57-0007__main__19"/>man sat <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1039__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1039__End"/> in it, near a fire over<lb n="c57-0007__main__20"/>which he was preparing his breakfast <lb n="c57-0007__main__21"/>he turned <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1053__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1053__End"/> on hearing a noise <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1056__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1056__End"/><del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1059__Start"/>on<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1059__End"/><lb n="c57-0007__main__22"/><lb n="c57-0007__left_margin__1"/>and perceiving me shrieked loudly and quiting <lb n="c57-0007__main__23"/>the hut ran across the fields with <lb n="c57-0007__main__24"/>a speed <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1078__Start"/>little<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1078__End"/> of which his debilitated form <lb n="c57-0007__main__25"/>hardly appeared capable. His flight <lb n="c57-0007__main__26"/>somewhat surprised me – but I was <lb n="c57-0007__main__27"/>inchanted with the appearance of the <lb n="c57-0007__main__28"/>hut. Here the snow and rain could not <lb n="c57-0007__main__29"/>penetrate – the ground was dry and wind <lb n="c57-0007__main__30"/>expelled and it <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1107__Start"/>appeared<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1107__End"/>presented to me then <lb n="c57-0007__main__31"/>as <del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1116__Start"/>heavenly and divine<del loc="c57-0007__main__d1e1116__End"/> exquisite &di<lb n="c57-0008__main__1"/>vine a retreat as Pandemonium appeared <lb n="c57-0008__main__2"/>to the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1132__Start"/>tr<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1132__End"/> dominions of Hell<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1136__Start"/>.<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1136__End"/> after thier suffocation in the <lb n="c57-0008__left_margin__1"/>lake of <lb n="c57-0008__left_margin__2"/>fire. I greedily <lb n="c57-0008__main__3"/>devoured the remnants of the shepherds <lb n="c57-0008__main__4"/>breakfast which consisted of bread, cheese, <lb n="c57-0008__main__5"/>milk & rhenish wine; the latter of which <lb n="c57-0008__main__6"/>however I did not like. Then overcome <lb n="c57-0008__main__7"/>by fatigue I lay down among some straw <lb n="c57-0008__main__8"/>& fell asleep.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0008__main__9"/>It was noon when I awoke and allured <lb n="c57-0008__main__10"/>by the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1178__Start"/>warth<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1178__End"/> warmth of the sun I deter<lb n="c57-0008__main__11"/>mined to recommence my travels–&<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1189__Start"/>wrapping<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1189__End"/><del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1192__Start"/>dep<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1192__End"/><lb n="c57-0008__left_margin__1"/>depositing<lb n="c57-0008__main__12"/> the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1208__Start"/>rest<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1208__End"/>remains of the <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1215__Start"/>herds bre<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1215__End"/> peasants break<lb n="c57-0008__main__13"/>fast in a wallet I found, I proceeded <lb n="c57-0008__main__14"/>across the fields for several hours, untill <lb n="c57-0008__main__15"/>at sunset I <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1231__Start"/>came to<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1231__End"/>arrived at a village. How mira<lb n="c57-0008__main__16"/>culous did this appear. The huts the neater <lb n="c57-0008__main__17"/>cottages & stat<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>elier houses engaged my <lb n="c57-0008__main__18"/>admiration by turns– The vegetables in the <lb n="c57-0008__main__19"/>gardens<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1264__Start"/>allured me<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1264__End"/> and the milk and <lb n="c57-0008__main__20"/>cheese that I saw placed at <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1270__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1270__End"/> the windows <lb n="c57-0008__main__21"/>of some of the cottagesallured me— One of the best of <lb n="c57-0008__main__22"/>these I entered– but I had hardly placed <lb n="c57-0008__main__23"/>my foot <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1287__Start"/>inside<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1287__End"/>within the door before the <lb n="c57-0008__main__24"/>children shrieked and one of the child<lb n="c57-0008__main__25"/>ren women fainted, the village was roused <lb n="c57-0008__main__26"/>some fled,—some attacked me untill <lb n="c57-0008__main__27"/>grievously bruised by <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1312__Start"/>sticks<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1312__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>stones and <del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1323__Start"/>all<del loc="c57-0008__main__d1e1323__End"/><lb n="c57-0008__main__28"/>many other kinds of missile weapon I<lb n="c57-0009__main__1"/>escaped to the open country and fear <lb n="c57-0009__main__2"/>fully took refuge in a low <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1339__Start"/>hut<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1339__End"/>hovel –quite <lb n="c57-0009__main__3"/>bare and making a wretched appearance <lb n="c57-0009__main__4"/>after the pal<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1351__Start"/>l<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1351__End"/>aces I had beheld in the <lb n="c57-0009__main__5"/>village.– This <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1358__Start"/>hut<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1358__End"/>hovel however adjoined a <lb n="c57-0009__main__6"/>cottage of a neat & pleasant appearance, <lb n="c57-0009__main__7"/>but after my late <metamark>^</metamark>dearly bought experience <lb n="c57-0009__main__8"/>I dared not enter it. My place of refuge<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0009.04">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0009__main__9"/><del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1388__Start"/>was the tool house and had not been<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1388__End"/><lb n="c57-0009__main__10"/>was not used <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1398__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1398__End"/> by the inhabitants of the ad<lb n="c57-0009__main__11"/>joining dwelling and was entirely shut <lb n="c57-0009__main__12"/>out from view by a pigstye on one <lb n="c57-0009__main__13"/>side and a dunghill & small <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1412__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1412__End"/>pool <lb n="c57-0009__main__14"/>on <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1417__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1417__End"/> another – the two others were <lb n="c57-0009__main__15"/>formed by the wall of the cottage. Here <lb n="c57-0009__main__16"/>then I retreated and lay down happy to have <lb n="c57-0009__main__17"/>found a shelter from the inclemency <lb n="c57-0009__main__18"/>of the season & still more from the <lb n="c57-0009__main__19"/>barbarity of man <lb n="c57-0009__main__20"/><metamark function="separate">___________________________</metamark><lb n="c57-0009__main__21"/> was constructed of wood, but so low that <lb n="c57-0009__main__22"/>I could with difficulty sit upright in <lb n="c57-0009__main__23"/>it. <del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1458__Start"/>The<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1458__End"/><del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1461__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1461__End"/><del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1464__Start"/>earth<del loc="c57-0009__main__d1e1464__End"/> No wood however <lb n="c57-0009__main__24"/>was placed on the earth which formed <lb n="c57-0009__main__25"/>the floor of the cottage but it was dry <lb n="c57-0009__main__26"/>and although the wind entered by <lb n="c57-0009__main__27"/>innumerable chinks I found it an <lb n="c57-0009__main__28"/>agreable assylum from the snow <lb n="c57-0009__main__29"/>& rain<lb n="c57-0010__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0010.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 2<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__2"/>As soon as morning dawned I crept from <lb n="c57-0010__main__3"/>my assylum <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1497__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1497__End"/> that I might view the <lb n="c57-0010__main__4"/>adjacent cottage and discover if I could <lb n="c57-0010__main__5"/>remain in the kennel that I had found. <lb n="c57-0010__main__6"/>It was situated <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>against the back of the cottage <lb n="c57-0010__main__7"/>and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>surrounded on <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1531__Start"/>its<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1531__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1544__Start"/>open<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1544__End"/>the sides which were exposed <lb n="c57-0010__main__8"/>by a pigstye & –clear pool of water one <lb n="c57-0010__main__9"/>part was open and by that I had crept <lb n="c57-0010__main__10"/>in but now <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1564__Start"/>with stones and wood<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1564__End"/> I cover <lb n="c57-0010__main__11"/>ed every crevice with stones & wood by which I might be <lb n="c57-0010__main__12"/>discovered <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0010.01">^</metamark> yet in such a manner <lb n="c57-0010__main__13"/>that I could move them on an occasion <lb n="c57-0010__main__14"/>to pass out; all the light I enjoyed came <lb n="c57-0010__main__15"/>through the stye and that was suffi<lb n="c57-0010__main__16"/>cient for me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__17"/>Having thus arranged my dwelling &<lb n="c57-0010__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1603__Start"/>spr<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1603__End"/> carpeted it with clean straw, I retired <lb n="c57-0010__main__19"/>for I saw the figure of a man at a distance <lb n="c57-0010__main__20"/>and <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1618__Start"/>feared<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1618__End"/> I <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1621__Start"/>feared<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1621__End"/> remembered <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1624__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1624__End"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__21"/>too well my treatment the night <lb n="c57-0010__main__22"/>before <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1632__Start"/>not<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1632__End"/> to trust myself in his <lb n="c57-0010__main__23"/>power. I had first however provided <lb n="c57-0010__main__24"/>for my sustenance for that day <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1639__Start"/>by mean<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1639__End"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__25"/>by a loaf of <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1645__Start"/>bro<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1645__End"/> coarse bread which I pur<lb n="c57-0010__main__26"/>loined and a cup with which I could <del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1660__Start"/>take<del loc="c57-0010__main__d1e1660__End"/><lb n="c57-0010__main__27"/>drink more conveniently than from my<lb n="c57-0011__main__1"/>hand <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1682__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1682__End"/>ofthe pure water which flowed by my <lb n="c57-0011__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1698__Start"/>house<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1698__End"/>retreat – <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1705__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1705__End"/>The floor <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1721__Start"/>of that<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1721__End"/><del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1724__Start"/>being<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1724__End"/><lb n="c57-0011__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0011__left_margin__1"/>was a little raised <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>so that it was kept <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>perfectly dry and by <lb n="c57-0011__main__4"/>its vicinity to the chimney of the <lb n="c57-0011__main__5"/>kitchen fire of the cottage it was <lb n="c57-0011__main__6"/>tolerably warm. <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1762__Start"/>And<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1762__End"/>Being thus provided <lb n="c57-0011__main__7"/>I determined to reside in this hovel <lb n="c57-0011__main__8"/>untill <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1776__Start"/>o<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1776__End"/> something should occur which <lb n="c57-0011__main__9"/>might alter my determination. It <lb n="c57-0011__main__10"/>was indeed a paradise compared to <lb n="c57-0011__main__11"/>the blea<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1786__Start"/>c<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1786__End"/>k forest, my former residence, <lb n="c57-0011__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1790__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1790__End"/> the<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1793__Start"/>ir<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1793__End"/> rain dropping <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1798__Start"/>leaves<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1798__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>branches <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& the dank earth. I ate <lb n="c57-0011__main__13"/>my breakfast with pleasure and was <lb n="c57-0011__main__14"/>about to remove a plank to procure <lb n="c57-0011__main__15"/>myself a little water when I heard <lb n="c57-0011__main__16"/>a step and looking through a small <lb n="c57-0011__main__17"/>chink a beheld a young creature <lb n="c57-0011__main__18"/>with a pail on her head passing <lb n="c57-0011__main__19"/>before my hovel. The girl was young<lb n="c57-0011__main__20"/>and of gentle demænour unlike what <lb n="c57-0011__main__21"/>I have since found Cottagers and farm <lb n="c57-0011__main__22"/>house servants to be – Yet she was mean <lb n="c57-0011__main__23"/>ly dressed – a <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1845__Start"/>blue<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1845__End"/> coarse <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>blue petticoat and a <lb n="c57-0011__main__24"/><lb n="c57-0011__left_margin__1"/>linen jacket being her only garb <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1866__Start"/>on<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1866__End"/> her fair hair <lb n="c57-0011__main__25"/>was plaited but not adorned; she looked patient <lb n="c57-0011__main__26"/>yet sad. She passed <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1874__Start"/>aw<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1874__End"/> away but in a quarter <lb n="c57-0011__main__27"/>of an hour returned, <del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1879__Start"/>be<del loc="c57-0011__main__d1e1879__End"/> bearing the pail which <lb n="c57-0011__main__28"/>was now partly filled with milk. As she walked <lb n="c57-0011__main__29"/>along seemingly incommoded by the burthen<lb n="c57-0012__main__1"/>a young man met her whose countenance <lb n="c57-0012__main__2"/>expressed a deeper desponcens<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1903__Start"/>des<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1903__End"/>cesly; <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1910__Start"/>than her<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1910__End"/><lb n="c57-0012__main__3"/>uttering a few <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1918__Start"/>words<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1918__End"/>sounds with <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1925__Start"/>ain<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1925__End"/> an air of <lb n="c57-0012__main__4"/>melancholy he took the pail from her head <lb n="c57-0012__main__5"/>and bore it into the cottage himself. She <lb n="c57-0012__main__6"/>followed <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1935__Start"/>wiping<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1935__End"/><del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1938__Start"/>dry my her tears whi<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1938__End"/>, and they <lb n="c57-0012__main__7"/>diasppeared – Presently I saw the young man <lb n="c57-0012__main__8"/>again with some tools in his hand cross the <lb n="c57-0012__main__9"/>field opposite the cottage and the girl was <lb n="c57-0012__main__10"/>also busied sometimes in <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1956__Start"/>and som<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1956__End"/> the cottage <lb n="c57-0012__main__11"/>and sometimes in the yard where she fed<lb n="c57-0012__main__12"/>some <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1969__Start"/>ck<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1969__End"/> chickens. <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1973__Start"/>and after some hours<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1973__End"/> While <lb n="c57-0012__main__13"/>I examined my dwelling I discovered that part <lb n="c57-0012__main__14"/>of the cottage window had formerly occupied <lb n="c57-0012__main__15"/>a corner of it <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1982__Start"/>pu<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1982__End"/> but the panes had <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1985__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1985__End"/> been <lb n="c57-0012__main__16"/>filled up with wood. In one of these was <lb n="c57-0012__main__17"/>a small & allmost imperceptible <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1993__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1993__End"/> chink, <lb n="c57-0012__main__18"/>through which <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1998__Start"/>howev<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e1998__End"/> the eye could just <lb n="c57-0012__main__19"/>penetrate; <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2012__Start"/>and looking in<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2012__End"/><del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2015__Start"/>I behe<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2015__End"/>thro this chink a <lb n="c57-0012__main__20"/>small room was visible, whitewashed <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& clean but very <lb n="c57-0012__main__21"/>bare of furniture <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2040__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2040__End"/> in <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2043__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2043__End"/> one corner near <lb n="c57-0012__main__22"/>a small fire <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2050__Start"/>I saw<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2050__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2059__Start"/>beheld<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2059__End"/>sate an old man <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2068__Start"/>sitting<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2068__End"/> leaning <lb n="c57-0012__main__23"/>his head on his hand <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2074__Start"/>–<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2074__End"/> in a disconslate atti<lb n="c57-0012__main__24"/>tude — <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0012.01">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0012__left_margin__1"/>his hair <lb n="c57-0012__left_margin__2"/>was grey The young girl was <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2097__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2097__End"/> occupied in <lb n="c57-0012__main__25"/>arranging the cottage <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2103__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2103__End"/>but presentlywhen that was <lb n="c57-0012__main__26"/>done she took somthing out of<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2116__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2116__End"/> a drawer <lb n="c57-0012__main__27"/>which employed her hands <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2123__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2123__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& sat down beside <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2132__Start"/>the o<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2132__End"/> the old <lb n="c57-0012__main__28"/>man who taking up an <del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2141__Start"/>instur<del loc="c57-0012__main__d1e2141__End"/> instrument began <lb n="c57-0012__main__29"/>to play and to produce sounds sweeter than <lb n="c57-0012__main__30"/>the voice of the thrush or nightingale. <note> This chapter is too short </note><lb n="c57-0013__main__1"/>It was a lovely sight even to me poor <lb n="c57-0013__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2159__Start"/>whec<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2159__End"/> wretch who had never beheld aught <lb n="c57-0013__main__3"/>beautiful before. <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2166__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2166__End"/>the silver hairs &<lb n="c57-0013__main__4"/>benevolent countenance <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2184__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2184__End"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2187__Start"/>more<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2187__End"/> aged <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2190__Start"/>inhabit<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2190__End"/> cottager won my reverence <lb n="c57-0013__main__5"/>while <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the gentle manners of the girl enticed <lb n="c57-0013__main__6"/>my love. He played a sweet mournful <lb n="c57-0013__main__7"/>air which I percieved drew tears from <lb n="c57-0013__main__8"/>the eyes of <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2216__Start"/>the gen amiable gir<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2216__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2225__Start"/>you<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2225__End"/> amiable companion<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2230__Start"/>till her<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2230__End"/><lb n="c57-0013__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/>of which the old man took <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>no notice <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2251__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2251__End"/> it untill <lb n="c57-0013__main__10"/>she sobbed audibly – He <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2257__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2257__End"/> then pronounced <lb n="c57-0013__main__11"/>a few sounds and the poor creature leaving <lb n="c57-0013__main__12"/>her work knelt at his feet he rasied her <lb n="c57-0013__main__13"/>and smiled with such <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2266__Start"/>grace<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2266__End"/> kindness &<lb n="c57-0013__main__14"/>love that I felt <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2272__Start"/>my own hard nerves<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2272__End"/>sensations of a peculiar & overpowering<lb n="c57-0013__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2279__Start"/>move and I was obliged to withdraw from<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2279__End"/><lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/>nature they were a<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2295__Start"/>nature<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2295__End"/>mixtureof pain & pleasure; such <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2305__Start"/>as<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2305__End"/> as I had never experienced<lb n="c57-0013__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2310__Start"/>my the hole. Presently the young ma<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2310__End"/>either from<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2316__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2316__End"/>hunger or cold, <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2322__Start"/>orfrom<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2322__End"/>or warmth or food and I<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2335__Start"/>withdrew<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2335__End"/>from my stationwithdrew<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__2"/>unable to<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__3"/>bear<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2356__Start"/>these new<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2356__End"/>these<lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__4"/><del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2366__Start"/>emotio<del loc="c57-0013__left_margin__d1e2366__End"/>emotions<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0013__main__17"/>Soon after this the young man returned <lb n="c57-0013__main__18"/>bearing on his sholders a <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2383__Start"/>load<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2383__End"/> load of wood <lb n="c57-0013__main__19"/>the<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2388__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2388__End"/> girl met him at the door<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2391__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2391__End"/> helped <lb n="c57-0013__main__20"/>to relieve him of his burden and <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2397__Start"/>took<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2397__End"/><lb n="c57-0013__main__21"/>taking some of it into the <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2402__Start"/>fire<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2402__End"/> cottage <lb n="c57-0013__main__22"/>placed it on the fire; <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2407__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2407__End"/> then she and the <lb n="c57-0013__main__23"/>youth went apart into a <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2416__Start"/>nok<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2416__End"/>nook of the cottage <lb n="c57-0013__main__24"/>and he shewed her a large loaf and a piece <lb n="c57-0013__main__25"/>of cheese.—She seemed pleased and went <lb n="c57-0013__main__26"/>into the garden for soome roots & plants <lb n="c57-0013__main__27"/>which she placed in water and then upon <lb n="c57-0013__main__28"/>the fire–. She <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2439__Start"/>then<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2439__End"/>afterwards continued her work <lb n="c57-0013__left_margin__1"/>whilst<lb n="c57-0013__main__29"/>the young man went into the <del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2458__Start"/>pa<del loc="c57-0013__main__d1e2458__End"/> garden <lb n="c57-0013__main__30"/>and appeared busily employed in digging & pul<lb n="c57-0014__main__1"/>pulling up roots– –After he had been employed <lb n="c57-0014__main__2"/>thus about <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2473__Start"/>hal<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2473__End"/> an hour the young woman <lb n="c57-0014__main__3"/>joined him, & they returned to the cottage <lb n="c57-0014__main__4"/>together – The old man in the mean time <lb n="c57-0014__main__5"/>had been pe<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nsive but on the approach <lb n="c57-0014__main__6"/> of <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2497__Start"/>the others<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2497__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his companions he assumed a <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2510__Start"/>pen<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2510__End"/>more cheerful <lb n="c57-0014__main__7"/>air, and they sat down to eat. They quickly <lb n="c57-0014__main__8"/>finished the<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2526__Start"/>ir<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2526__End"/> meal <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>was quickly dispatched; the young woman was <lb n="c57-0014__main__9"/>again occupied in arranging the cottage the <lb n="c57-0014__main__10"/>old man walked before the door in the <lb n="c57-0014__main__11"/>sun for a few minutes, leaning on the arm of the youth<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2555__Start"/>man<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2555__End"/><lb n="c57-0014__main__12"/>Nothing could exceed in beauty the contrast <lb n="c57-0014__main__13"/>between these two <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2563__Start"/>love<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2563__End"/><del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2566__Start"/>excl<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2566__End"/> excellent <lb n="c57-0014__main__14"/>creatures One was old, with silver hairs <lb n="c57-0014__main__15"/>and a countenance beaming with bene <lb n="c57-0014__main__16"/>volence & love; the younger was slight<lb n="c57-0014__main__17"/>and graceful in his <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2584__Start"/>fu<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2584__End"/> figure and <lb n="c57-0014__main__18"/>his feautures were moulded with the <lb n="c57-0014__main__19"/>finest <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2593__Start"/>simetry<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2593__End"/>symmetry – yet his eyes & attitude <lb n="c57-0014__main__20"/>expressed the utmost sadness and despon <lb n="c57-0014__main__21"/>dencency— The old man returned to the <lb n="c57-0014__main__22"/>cottage; and the youth with tools different <lb n="c57-0014__main__23"/>from those which he had used in the morning, <lb n="c57-0014__main__24"/>directed his steps across the fields– Night <lb n="c57-0014__main__25"/>quickly shut in but to my extreme won <lb n="c57-0014__main__26"/>der I found that the cottagers had a <lb n="c57-0014__main__27"/>means of prolonging light by the use of tapers <lb n="c57-0014__main__28"/>and was pleased to find that <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2623__Start"/>end<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2623__End"/> setting <lb n="c57-0014__main__29"/>of the sun did not put an end <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2629__Start"/>I had<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2629__End"/> to <lb n="c57-0014__main__30"/>the pleasure I experienced in watching <del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2634__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0014__main__d1e2634__End"/><lb n="c57-0015__main__1"/>my human neighbours.–In the evening <lb n="c57-0015__main__2"/>the young girl and her companion <lb n="c57-0015__main__3"/>were employed in various occupations; <lb n="c57-0015__main__4"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2653__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2653__End"/>which I did not then understand, & the <lb n="c57-0015__main__5"/>old man again took that instru <lb n="c57-0015__main__6"/>ment which produced the divine <lb n="c57-0015__main__7"/>sounds that had enchanted me in <lb n="c57-0015__main__8"/>the morning. <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2677__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2677__End"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2680__Start"/>When<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2680__End"/>So soon as he had finish <lb n="c57-0015__main__9"/>-ed the youth began,– not to play,– but <lb n="c57-0015__main__10"/>to utter<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2702__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2702__End"/> sounds which were monoto <lb n="c57-0015__main__11"/>nous <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2708__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2708__End"/> and <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2713__Start"/>far from<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2713__End"/>neither resembling the harmony <lb n="c57-0015__main__12"/>of the old mans instrument or the <lb n="c57-0015__main__13"/>songs of the birds I since found that <lb n="c57-0015__main__14"/>he read aloud, but at that time I knew nothing of the <lb n="c57-0015__main__15"/>science of words or letters. at that <lb n="c57-0015__main__16"/>time<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2749__Start"/>.<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2749__End"/> The family soon extinguished <lb n="c57-0015__main__17"/>their lights and retired, as I conjectured, <lb n="c57-0015__main__18"/>to <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2756__Start"/>sleep<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2756__End"/>. rest
